attribute.name: decay_slope
attribute.digest: The shape of the decay envelope segment
attribute.description: The shape of the decay envelope segment. Positive and negative values create steep curves. A value of 0 is linear.

attribute.name: release_time
attribute.description: Release time in milliseconds. The time needed to travel to the end value after the trigger is turned off (e.g. a MIDI noteoff message is received).

attribute.name: decay_time
attribute.description: Decay time in milliseconds. The time needed to travel from the peak value to the sustain level.

attribute.name: attack_slope
attribute.digest: The shape of the attack envelope segment
attribute.description: The shape of the attack envelope segment. Positive and negative values create steep curves. A value of 0 is linear.

attribute.name: end
attribute.digest: The value of the envelope at the end of the release stage
attribute.description: The value of the envelope at the end of the release stage.

attribute.name: sustain
attribute.digest: The level reached at the end of the decay stage
attribute.description: The level reached at the end of the decay stage. The value will remain at this level until triggered off (e.g. by a MIDI noteoff) unless it is in loop, sync, or beat mode.

attribute.name: release_slope
attribute.digest: The shape of the release envelope segment
attribute.description: The shape of the release envelope segment. Positive and negative values create steep curves. A value of 0 is linear.

attribute.name: peak
attribute.digest: The value which marks the end of the attack stage, and the beginning of the decay stage
attribute.description: The value which marks the end of the attack stage, and the beginning of the decay stage.

attribute.name: attack_time
attribute.description: Attack time in milliseconds. The time needed to travel from the initial value to the peak value.

attribute.name: initial
attribute.digest: The value of the envelope at the moment it is triggered
attribute.description: The value of the envelope at the moment it is triggered.
